mention.text: Nation shuffling top diplomats and honing its rhetoric to defend image .
MEXICO CITY - The rise of Donald Trump and the anti-immigrant wave he is riding in his presidential primary campaign
quiet , with a few high-profile exceptions , rather than publicly challenging Trump 's claims
their countrymen living in the United States
a Mexican official who was not authorized to speak publicly on this issue
the consul general in Los Angeles
Miguel BasA A A A ez Ebergenyi
Mexico 's ambassador to the United States from 2007 to 2013
